article:
'AssureSign' is an electronic signature software solution "Company Profile:
AssureSign." Crunchbase. 25 January 2009. TechCrunch. 29 September 2011.
http://www.crunchbase.com/company/assuresign. that can be deployed as a
Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) application or installed on customer premise.
Documents are signed using a computer that has an Internet
connection. "AssureSign.com - Electronic Signature Technology."
KillerStartups.com. 12 November 2008. KillerStartups. 29 September 2011. http://www.killerstartups.com/Web20/assuresign-com-electronic-signature-
technology.

AssureSign electronic signature technology was the first to use patent-pending
biometric, handwritten, mouse-based signatures. Dawson, Carolyn J.
"AssureSign's Electronic Signature Software Increases Efficiency and Expedites
Authorizations." Financial Tech Spotlight. 25 January 2011. http://financial.tmcnet.com//topics/financial-technology/articles/138062-
assuresigns-electronic-signature-software-increases-efficiency-expedites-
authori.htm.

AssureSign's DocumentNOWÂ® and DocumentTRAKâ¢ API tools enable users to integrate
with existing environments. "AssureSign API Profile." Programmable Web. n.d.
Programmable Web. 29 September 2011.
http://www.programmableweb.com/api/assuresign. AssureSign maintains a
partner program that includes integration partners and resellers. It is
available via the Microsoft Dynamics Marketplace and salesforce.com AppExchange.
AssureSign has also been integrated with other third party applications
including Microsoft Sharepoint, Oracle and [http://www.duckcreektech.com/ Duck
Creek Technologies] insurance applications. Morrell, Jennifer. "AssureSign
Electronic Signature Launches." Insurance Networking News. 2 September 2010. ht-
tp://www.insurancenetworking.com/vwc/insurance_technology_AssureSign_Duck_Creek-
_electronic_signatures-25717-1.html.

AssureSign Electronic Signature Technology was developed in 2006 as an offering
by [http://www.3pv.com Third Party Verification, Inc. (3PV)] Ward, Jesse.
"Sign Your John Hancock Online." Rural Telecommunications. 1 May 2006. http://www.highbeam.com/doc/1G1-
147063481.html. AssureSign LLC was formed as a separate company in 2008 by
David Brinkman and Dale Combs. AssureSign and 3PV are consistently ranked on
Orlando Sentinel's Top 100 Companies for Working Families. "Celebrating the
best companies in Central Florida." Orlando Sentinel. 9 August 2009. https://ex-
tra.orlandosentinel.com/Secure/top100/images/2009_top100_special_section.pdf. "Celebrating the best companies in Central Florida for Working
Families." Orlando Sentinel. 8 August 2010. "Celebrating the best
companies in Central Florida for Working Families." Orlando Sentinel. 7 August
2011. http://www.print2webcorp.com/mkt/Orlando/main/Top%20100.aspx?c=13623813 Dawson, Carolyn J. "AssureSign Named a Top Company for Working
Families." TMCnet. 11 August 2011. http://www.tmcnet.com/channels/call-center-workforce-
management/articles/206821-assuresign-named-top-company-working-
families.htm
